summary:
Jotunheimr (wip/8 cells dungeon)
New quests (wip/fully voice acted)
descriptionHtml:
In the next update:
Quest in the land of Skyrim:
Mystery of the Maniter Tavern
-Quest!
80% completed
-Voice acting!
60% completed
>Maniter Tavern Expansions:
The Bloodless Recession (Choice 1)
The Cycle of Life (Choice 2)
>Additional Quest
Into the Void (Maniter Ghost)

New Cities (Groveburg and Hansdell)
90% completed
Voice Acting 0%
Interior Cells 20% completed
Main Quest
5% completed
Side Quests
Saving Graysalt
10% completed
Murder in Hansdell
10% completed
The Jester Cave
10% completed
Castle Jotunheimr
10% completed

Dungeons:
-More dungeons! (Puritist Banneret\'s Lair, Gardens of Grief and Halls of Dispair)
110% completed - will add more!

Others
-Bug fixes! 
-Compatibility with Realistic Lightning 

Known issues: 
-\"One word of warning, though, don\'t play it with SkyMoMo Spawns for animals set to 5+\"
-Ogdar

-\"Not compatible with Realistic Lightning\" - will be fixed in the next update! 

-\"Quest is uncomplete and may not work\" - will be completed in the next update! (with Voice Acting!)

The first dungeon (Jotunheimr) features:
Four bosses! (One has a backstory in the form of a six pages journal!)
Ingenious level design! (I spent a lot of time trying to make it look special, different, epic and pretty at the same time.)
Challenging enemies! (Fully Geared/Enchanted Level 35 and above recommended)
Epic puzzle! (Labyrinth)
A complete armor set (Nifhel) and 2 powerful staves (Hel)
-> Remodeling of the armor in progress

I would love to hear your comments and bug reports so don\\\'t be afraid to post in the comment section, I won\'t bite



The next update will be a big one and I\'ll try to fix every single aspects of the mod to make it as professional as possible. It will take a lot of time as I\'m working alone.
author: Uncle Remus
